Trade/Device Name(s): Triage® Protein C Calibration Verification Controls
Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose System For In Vitro Coagulation Studies
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Triage Protein C Controls and Calibration Verification Controls as assayed materials for laboratory monitoring of the Triage Protein C Test.
Indications for Use Summary: Assayed materials used with the Triage Protein C Test to assist laboratories in monitoring test performance and validating assay performance throughout its measurable range.
